comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: bioguide.congress.gov/scripts/biodisplay.pl?index=G000395 suggests his first name is Finly (without an "e") GRAY, Finly Hutchinson, (1863 - 1947) Representative from Indiana en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Finly_H._Gray NYT of October 31, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=980CE0D9133FE633A... indicates that he was unhappy about legislators suggesting they chip in for a wedding gift for Jessie Wilson, daughter of President Woodrow Wilson

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See hdl.loc.gov/loc.award/iauchau./grayfh/1 for a brochure for Gray as a lecturer on the Chautauqua Circuit.
